items.sentence: What I was trying to say was that I could help Tom, but I don't want to.
If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go with others.

No one knew what he was actually called. Everyone simply called him Tom.
It's unlikely anybody other than Tom would be interested in buying this.
Tom finally realized Mary was never going to consider him her boyfriend.
My brother is so smart and witty that I can not beat him in an argument.
I borrowed the book from the library, but I haven't read much of it yet.
Nothing is the matter with the car. It's just that you are a bad driver.
